Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, south of the Klondike Wheat Fields.
Room.LongDescription: The Klondike Wheat Fields produce more wheat and grain than one can comfortably imagine. Most of the grain is eventually stored in the graineries and silos on the south side of the street. The Wheat Fields may be entered from the west side off of Lankshire Parkway.
